summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Vox OS Google Calendar integration. All OAuth endpoints, calendar events fetching, and frontend UI states working correctly. Graceful fallback to local events when Google Calendar not connected. Chat, briefings, and task creation all functional.
passed_tests: Google Calendar events fetching with 'not connected' fallback (/api/google-calendar/events)
Morning briefing generation with calendar context note
Evening briefing generation with calendar context note
Frontend 'Connect Google Calendar' button display when not connected
Frontend calendar info toggle explaining Vox capabilities
Frontend local calendar events display as fallback
Task creation and management through chat and UI
Briefing generation includes calendar source information
OAuth URL contains proper Google OAuth parameters
Calendar panel shows correct connection status
All core Vox OS functionality (chat, tasks, memories, briefings)

success_percentage.backend: 100% (27/27 tests passed including Google Calendar integration)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all Google Calendar UI states and core functionality working)
